attributes.action: Accept Hazel Blears resignation for blatently abusing the expenses system by charging for 3 properties and cynically claiming the maximum amount possible on her expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British tax payers are sick of the goverment spending our taxes to enhance their lifestyles, and having the audacity to say 'we were keeping to the rules'. Their lack of remorse is disgusting. Many should and will loose their seats at the next elections. Their greed will be their undoing.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
